name: Zan Gear
description: Zan Gear is a handheld spinoff of the Zan series. It depicts a war between Tokugawa Sekigahara (blue) and Ishida (red). The aim of the game is for the player to control the blue army and defeat the red army. Controlling army requires careful strategy by recruiting adequate soldiers and choosing where to start a battle. Capturing key fortifications will boost the blue army's control over the land. Members of the green army are neutral and can be recruited by either side.
